channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump DHS links data for new citizenship tracking tool. And, Senate discusses tax bill
item.description: The Trump administration is developing a searchable national citizenship data system, worrying some officials. And, the Senate focuses on the sweeping...

item.title: Decades later, Karen de Boer still remembers a kind gesture from her college hallmate
item.description: As a college freshman, Karen de Boer was sometimes inconsiderate to her hallmate, Pam. So when Karen missed the bus to her choir performance, she was ...

item.title: This company wants to be the first to mine the ocean floor, with Trump's help
item.description: The Metals Company is applying for permission from the Trump administration to mine for nickel and cobalt beneath a remote patch of the Pacific Ocean....

item.title: Click, speak, move: These brain implants are poised to help people with disabilities
item.description: People who can no longer move or speak may soon have a new option: an implanted device that links their brain to a computer.

item.title: In effort to protect children, France bans smoking at parks and beaches
item.description: Smokers are no longer allowed to light up in public parks, at swimming pools, or at beaches, or "anywhere children may be present," said French health...

item.title: US must rule out more strikes before new talks, Iranian minister tells BBC
item.description: Majid Takht-Ravanchi said the Trump administration has "not made their position clear" on further attacks.

item.title: HELOC interest rates vs. home equity loan interest rates: What lending experts say to know this July
item.description: The Fed's next moves will play a big role in what happens next with HELOC and home equity loan rates.

item.title: Minimum wage set to rise in 15 cities and states in July. Here's where.
item.description: Hundreds of thousands of workers will see more money in their paychecks starting next month due to minimum wage increases.

item.title: 'A little bit melting': Intense heat across Europe
item.description: A new heat record for June of 46C was set in Spain this weekend as Europe experiences an intense heatwave.

item.title: Israeli strike on Gaza seafront cafe kills at least 20 Palestinians, witnesses and rescuers say
item.description: The outdoor cafe was frequently used by journalists, activists and local residents.

item.title: National pride is declining in America. And it’s splitting by party lines, new Gallup polling shows

item.title: A violent ambush in Idaho leaves 2 firefighters dead and 1 injured. What to know about the attack

item.title: Korean fast casual chain Seoul Spice eyes national expansion

item.title: Senate "vote-a-rama" underway on amendments to Trump "big beautiful" budget bill
item.description: The Senate began its "vote-a-rama" Monday morning on amendments to the Republican reconciliation bill. Voting could last into the night. CBS News' Nik...

item.title: Key witness in ex-Peru mayor's corruption case found dead
item.description: José Miguel Castro was collaborating with prosecutors in the corruption case against Susana Villarán.

item.title: 'Unprecedented' alerts in France as blistering heat grips Europe
item.description: Dozens of the country's mainland regions are currently under the second-highest alert as the heatwave continues.
